evidence.claim: Kohler uses AWS for cloud infrastructure to support healthcare data management.
References to integration with HL7 standards for health data exchange found in their developer documentation.
Implementation of X12 for electronic data interchange in healthcare transactions.
Utilization of Azure services for healthcare application hosting and management.
Mentions of FHIR as a standard for interoperability in their health-tech solutions.

icp.icp_reason: No specific use cases for X12 transactions or clearinghouse services found on the site.
